page.title: 18TRANSPORT COSTS IN OTTERTON
page.content:
As the number of private cars increases in this rural area, so the number of buses decreases and their cost increases. Current cost of a {Devon General}bus to{Sidmouth}or {Exmouth}from{Otterton}is 75p return per child::Â£1.50 return per adult. A taxi to Exmouth would cost Â£4.75p Buses leave at the following times:-
To Sidmouth: 08.17|09.32|11.57|13.57|15.57|16.57| 17.57|18.57| To Exmouth: 07.48|10.03|11.03|12.03|13.03|14.03| 15.03|16.08|17.08|
The school is very dependent on parental help with cars, plus occasional use of the{Bicton College Minibus, if one is free. A coach for 1/2 day would be Â£45 approx.
